title: Antithesis of the Star People
description: Several centuries in the future a small scout ship with three crewmen is sent on a mission to a red giant star. When they arrive they find earthmen have visited here before. Bizarre events begin to mount up one upon another. Will the many puzzles be solved in time and the earth saved from mass destruction? What agenda do extraterrestrials have? Should we be afraid?
author: Daniel Evjen
